verbs.description: [ARG0: Russian President Vladimir Putin] [V: said] [ARG1: he ' fully ' agrees with President Donald Trump on the treat of a new arms race with the U.S.]
Russian President Vladimir Putin said [ARG0: he] ' [ARGM-MNR: fully] ' [V: agrees] [ARG2: with President Donald Trump] [ARG1: on the treat of a new arms race with the U.S.]
